Uses of Class
GameObjects.GameObject

  • Packages that use GameObject 
    Package Description
    GameObjects  
    Main  

    • Uses of GameObject in GameObjects

      Subclasses of GameObject in GameObjects 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Projectile
      Projectile contain's code for the unique animating and movements of the shot.
      class  SpaceShip
      The SpaceShip child class differentiates itself from Projectiles in that it has various additions that allow greater control over the movement of the GameObject, and graphical display.

    • Uses of GameObject in Main

      Fields in Main declared as GameObject 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.enemies 
      private GameObject SpaceInvaders.player 
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.shots 
      Methods in Main that return GameObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.addNewShotToArray(GameObject[] originalObjects)
      addNewShotToArray() takes the original array of projectiles, and increases its size by 1, then it adds a new shot at the last element in the new array.
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.clearObjectArray()
      clearObjectArray() just returns an empty object array.
      private GameObject SpaceInvaders.createNewShot()
      This method creates and returns shots for addNewShotToArray() it also logs the time the shot was created to keep track of time between shots.
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.fillEnemyArray()
      This method fills the enemy array with enemies at a position off screen.
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.removeObject(int index, GameObject[] originalObjects)
      removeObject() is used whenever an item in an array needs to be deleted.
      Methods in Main with parameters of type GameObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.addNewShotToArray(GameObject[] originalObjects)
      addNewShotToArray() takes the original array of projectiles, and increases its size by 1, then it adds a new shot at the last element in the new array.
      private void SpaceInvaders.drawGameObjects(java.awt.Graphics pen, GameObject[] gameObjects)
      This is a general purpose method to loop through all of the game object arrays and call each element's draw method.
      private GameObject[] SpaceInvaders.removeObject(int index, GameObject[] originalObjects)
      removeObject() is used whenever an item in an array needs to be deleted.
